Package ut.twente.notebridge.routes

Class PostRoute

java.lang.Object
ut.twente.notebridge.routes.PostRoute
@Path("/posts") public class PostRoute extends Object
This class is used to handle the post-related routes.

      id - The id of the post
      Returns:
      The response with the post

      Returns:

    • getPosts

      @GET @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response getPosts(@QueryParam("pageSize") Integer pageSize, @QueryParam("pageNumber") Integer pageNumber, @QueryParam("sortBy") String sortBy, @QueryParam("personId") Integer personId, @QueryParam("search") String search, @QueryParam("filterBy") String filterBy, @QueryParam("sponsoredBy") Integer sponsorId)
      This method is used to get all posts.
      Parameters:
      pageSize - The page size
      pageNumber - The page number
      sortBy - The field to sort by
      personId - The id of the person
      search - The search query
      filterBy - The filter query
      sponsorId - The id of the sponsor
      Returns:
      The response with the posts

      id - The id of the post
      Returns:
      The response with the result as text

      Parameters:
      id - The id of the post
      Returns:
      The response with the images in base64 format

    • getPostsByPerson

      This method is used to get all posts created by a person.
      Parameters:
      personId - The id of the person
      Returns:
      The response with the posts
